text: * VMScluster is a computer cluster involving a group of computers running the OpenVMS operating system. * Whereas tightly coupled multiprocessor systems run a single copy of the operating system, a VMScluster is loosely coupled: each machine runs its own copy of OpenVMS, but the disk storage, lock manager, and security domain are all cluster-wide. * Machines can join or leave a VMScluster without affecting the rest of the cluster.
